gate.creole.coref

Class AliasMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.creole.coref.AliasMap

  • public class AliasMap
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple data structure for holding aliases. Each alias entry comprises:
    • a key (String)
    • an alias (String)
    • a confidence score (float, optional)
    For example: (ALEX, ALEXANDER, 0.85). The data is stored internally as a Map from key to List of AliasMap.AliasData.

      Data structure holding the information associated with an alias key.

        Gets all the aliases associated with the given key.
